div.p: Thank you for visiting our online home for Okeechobee County School District. Use the links above to view content and resources gathered for you in one place.

p.span: To prepare all students to be college and career ready and function as productive citizens.

div.h3: District Receives Gold Recognition as a Florida Healthy School District

img.alt: Okeechobee Receives Gold Level Recognition as a Florida Healthy School District
img.style: display: block; margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto;

p.i: Okeechobee County School District has received Corporate Accreditation through AdvancED. Our accreditation demonstrates our dedication to continuous improvement in all that we do. We are committed to preparing all students to be college and career ready and function as productive citizens.
